Package com.alibaba.graphscope.parallel

Interface DefaultMessageManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.alibaba.fastffi.FFIPointer, FFIType, MessageManagerBase, Serializable
    public interface DefaultMessageManager
extends MessageManagerBase
    The default message manager, used in serial apps DefaultAppBase and DefaultAppBase.
